column3: Latest;Kampong Cham: A strange discovery was made at a Sathapana ATM
column5: Kampong Cham town on 26 April 2019.------Police were called after a suitcase was left in the ATM
column6: after concerns it may be a bomb.------CMAC officials were called to the scene to investigate. After examining the case
column7: it was found to contain fake ‘ghost’ $ US.------CCTV footage showed the case was taken there by a local man who suffers from mental illness
column8: and often takes old things that he finds on the streets around the town and hides them in the ATM.
